name: Veggie Dice
description:
Become a true MasterChef in 'Veggie Dice: MasterChef's Journey'!
Challange yourself with more than 50 unique levels and challanges in the story mode!

Utilize the dicing system to earn more points, you can slice and dice veggies up to 4 pieces, in survival and chaos modes you can even create a dice chain, create as big of a dice chain as you can to earn even more bonus points!

'Veggie Dice: MasterChef's Journey' features 3 different game modes, Story mode, Survival mode and Chaos mode.

Some of the challanges & bonuses include:
- Huge veggies
- Exploding veggies
- Slow-motion
- Speed-motion
- Upside-down
- Race against time
- 50+ more challanges and levels
- With more challanges to come!

Challange yourself in story mode to become a true masterchef, show off your skills in survival mode or just cause chaos in chaos mode, and start not only slicing but also dicing in 'Veggie Dice: MasterChef's Journey' only on IOS!
